stories.text: All my non-technical contacts from art school have randomly been joining signal in the last two / three weeks. None of can give me a straight answer as to why. Is this a larger trend or maybe just a coincidence?
stories.title: Why are all my pretentious art friends joining signal all of a sudden?

stories.text: Idea is to help them develop their thinking capabilities. I'm biased towards coding, since the things to imagine and think are endless, but am not completely sure about it. I can do both too in parallel, but would like them to focus only one thing right now, since they are young, under 7. Or any other game/activity?
